title.narrative: The Emerging Africa Infrastructure Fund Ltd

description.narrative: The objective of EAIF is to increase the volume of private sector flows to infrastructure projects with private sector participation in Sub-Saharan Africa.;

participating-org.narrative: Swiss State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (SECO)
The Emerging Africa Infrastructure Fund Ltd (EAIF)

mailing-address.narrative: Kings Buildings 16 Smith Square London SW1P 3HQ

recipient-region.narrative: Highest Supra-national region in which the Facility Funders Agreement and/or Investment Policies (or equivalent) require each PIDG Facility to operate.

sector.narrative: The PIDG Trust does not require that disbursed or committed funds are used in a specific sector by the recipient PIDG Facility. As such, all funds are reported as DAC Code 51010 - Unearmarked contribution…general programme assistance (when not allocable by sector)
